message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
You wanted a fair split, but I think I deserve more for my negotiating skills!
You think you're worth 700k? I'm not buying it. Meet me in the middle!
You're getting desperate, Alice. Time to make a serious offer!
You're not getting 800k, Bob. I'm not afraid to walk away.
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. Don't think you can take me for a ride!
You're not getting 900k, Bob. It's time to make a real compromise.
You're really lowballing me now, Alice. I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're not getting a better deal than this, Bob. Take it or leave it.
Fine, I'll meet you halfway. But don't think this is the end of it!
